user.title: Area Occupancy Detection
user.description: Create a new area for intelligent occupancy detection

data_description.name: Enter a descriptive name for this area (e.g., Living Room, Office)

data_description.motion_sensors: Select one or more motion sensors in this area. At least one is required.

optional_sensors.title: Additional Configuration
optional_sensors.description: Set up optional sensors and settings for {name} (all fields are optional)

data_description.media_devices: Media players whose state indicates room usage
data_description.appliances: Devices with power monitoring that suggest activity
data_description.illuminance_sensors: Sensors that detect light level changes in the area
data_description.humidity_sensors: Sensors that detect humidity changes from room activity
data_description.temperature_sensors: Sensors that detect temperature changes from occupancy
data_description.threshold: Minimum probability value to consider the area occupied (0.0 to 1.0)
data_description.history_period: Number of days of historical data to analyze (1-30)
data_description.decay_enabled: Gradually decrease sensor influence over time
data_description.decay_window: Time in seconds before sensor readings fully decay (60-3600)
data_description.decay_type: How quickly sensor influence should decrease
data_description.historical_analysis_enabled: Use historical data to improve detection accuracy
data_description.minimum_confidence: Required confidence level for pattern predictions (0.0 to 1.0)

error.no_motion_sensors: At least one motion sensor is required for occupancy detection
error.invalid_threshold: Occupancy threshold must be between 0 and 1
error.invalid_history: History period must be between 1 and 30 days
error.invalid_decay: Decay window must be between 60 and 3600 seconds
error.invalid_confidence: Confidence level must be between 0 and 1
error.name_exists: An area with this name is already configured

abort.already_configured: This area is already configured. Please use Options to modify settings
abort.no_sensors: No compatible sensors were found in your system
